mapper.select: SELECT * FROM( SELECT SURVEY_NO, SURVEY_TITLE, SURVEY_WRITER, SURVEY_DATE, SURVEY_UPDATE, SURVEY_STATUS, SURVEY_STARTDATE, SURVEY_ENDDATE, SURVEY_RESULT, SURVEY_EDIT, SURVEY_STARTCOMMENT, SURVEY_STORAGE, E.EMPL_NAME, D.DEPT_NAME, P.POSITION_NAME, SUB_ANSWERSTATUS FROM SURVEY_TBL S LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM SURVEY_SUB WHERE SUB_ID = #{emplId} ) USING(SURVEY_NO) JOIN EMPL_TBL E ON S.SURVEY_WRITER = E.EMPL_ID JOIN DEPT_TBL D ON E.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE JOIN POSITION_TBL P ON E.POSITION_CODE = P.POSITION_CODE ORDER BY SURVEY_NO DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10
